summary: Property `control` of HTMLLabelElement not included in bundled externs

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Write code that reads the `control` property of an HTMLLabelElement 2. Compile that code with advanced optimizations What is the expected output? What do you see instead? A warning is generated, but none are expected because `control` is a standard property of HTMLLabelElement. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? closure-compiler.appspot.com on 14 Dec '12. Please provide any additional information below.
This issue was closed by revision r2406.
